data.title: The Transparency of Plaid Cymru – Party of Wales
data.meta_description: Dynamic Transparency Evaluation of Plaid Cymru – Party of Wales based on the Dyntra Methodology.
data.text: dpp111 Biographical data and Resumes of the President and / or Secretary General and Board of Directors on a supranational and/or national level are published. dpp112 The email addresses of the President and / or Secretary General and executive board on a supranational and/or national level are specified. dpp113 Payroll of the President and / or Secretary General and executive board on a supranational and/or national level are published. dpp114 Declaration of assets and property of the President and / or Secretary General and executive board on a supranational and/or national level are published. dpp115 The remuneration of per diem and travel expenses and protocol of the President and / or Secretary General and executive board on a supranational and/or national level are published. dpp116 There exists links to the social media of the President and / or Secretary General and executive board on a supranational and/or national level. dpp117 The party's organigram is published. dpp118 The President's and/or General Secretary's and executive board's agenda for party acts on a supranational and/or national level are published. dpp119 Biographical data, curriculum vitae, statement of assets and payroll of the party's manager are published. dpp1110 The recruitment processes of personnel are published. dpp1111 Regulatory agreements or pacts of the working conditions and existing collective conventions are published. dpp1112 The meeting minutes of the executive board of the party are published. dpp1113 Jobs and related salary indications of the party's employees are published. dpp1114 Las titulaciones que acreditan la formación recogida en el c.v. de Secretario General y los miembros de la Junta Directiva. dpp1115 Se pública la descripción de los procedimientos de elección de los cargos del Partido dpp1116 Se publican las retribuciones, de cualquier tipo, del Secretario/a General y la junta directiva o ejecutiva dpp121 The various governing bodies and their functions are specified. dpp122 Basic data of entities related to the party and the links to their web pages are specified. dpp123 The organic regulations of the party and the other internal norms are published. dpp124 There exists an "ethical code or good governance" of the party and it is published. dpp125 There exists a Transparency regulation of the party and it is published. dpp126 There exist measures for effective equality between men and women within the Party and they are published. dpp127 Se publican estadísticas sobre las diferencias de remuneración por género en todas las categorías dentro del partido dpp128 Se publica la presencia del Partido en los diferentes territorios: sedes, representantes politicos, total de cargos en representación del partido, etc. dpp129 Se publica el número de afiliados/as al partido dpp1210 Se publican los requisitos y procedimientos para afiliarse al partido dpp1211 Dispone de canales de comunicación con sus afiliados/as dpp211 The institution has a web 2.0. dpp212 The institutional website is Responsive Design (Adaptive to Mobile devices). dpp213 There is a blog of the President or Secretary General. dpp214 There is a news module on the web. dpp215 You can see the site map of the party's website. dpp216 The corporate website is accessible or has an accessibility module. dpp217 There is an internal search box within the website of the party. dpp218 Email addresses are specified for each of the departments of the party. dpp219 There is a transparency portal or the transparency information is found in a structured way within the institutional website. dpp2110 Social media profilea are integrated on the website and there exists a social media map of the party. dpp2111 It has integrated a video channel. dpp2112 There is a mailbox of the President and/or Secretary General. dpp2113 There is a complaints and claims box. dpp2114 The website is translated to English. dpp2115 All the transparency information within the institutional web or transparency portal is indexed.
